name: Juan Atkins
description: '''Juan Atkins''' (born September 12, 1962), also known as '''Model 500''' and '''Infiniti''', is an American record producer and DJ from [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]]. ''[[Mixmag]]'' has described him as "the original pioneer of [[Detroit techno]]." He has been a member of [[the Belleville Three]], [[Cybotron (American band)|Cybotron]], and Borderland.
